title: Save Password prompt when adding new account on IOS
body:
# Problem

iOS 13 Beta 4 asks user to Save password when signing transaction.
It could be considered as possible security breach.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28752642/63695122-a5579580-c820-11e9-848d-96afe98ba3b9.png)


## Steps

- use iOS 13
- open status
- sign transaction

@rachelhamlin  @corpetty @flexsurfer
Yes let's remove this option pls.
@Serhy could you do me a huge favor and check if this one can be reproduced on develop?

I have iOS 12 and could not reproduce this issue with enabled Keychain in Settings.
@churik could you check it please with iOS 13?
Thanks @Serhy. I'm going to deprioritize in that case.

It is reproducible on IOS 13.0.
Please, prioritize it again @rachelhamlin
Ick okay, thank you for checking @churik!

Issue Status: 1. **Open** 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. Done
__This issue now has a funding of 80.0 DAI (80.0 USD @ $1.0/DAI) attached to it.__ * If you would like to work on this issue you can 'start work' [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8837/3604). * Want to chip in? Add your own contribution [here](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8837/3604). * Questions? Please review their action plans below:


**1) [igetgames](https://gitcoin.co/igetgames) has been approved to start work.**

I will find a way to prevent the autofill feature from activating in iOS 13.

Learn more [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8837/3604).

issue is not reproducible after redesigning sign flow.
still can be reproduced https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10100#issuecomment-592572011
Currently, issue is reproducible when adding a new account in wallet (except for watch only), so the issue title is edited.

It would definitely be nice to have the prompt disabled but I don't think it's a blocker. Short term we could uglify the app a little with a warning before the prompt, I also think @adambabik proposal for user asset based schemes/warnings could be useful here, as saving the password for asset free accounts could be an option.
Don't ask on IOS 14.5, Status1.13, closing issue
